en.title: LatoStudio - B2B SaaS Platform
en.description: B2B SaaS CRM/ERP platform with AI-powered RAG chatbot. Designed backend architecture, APIs, automation, and production deployment.

en.title: Legal Operations Automation
en.description: Robust sync engine between MyCase and Monday.com for a US law firm. Reduced manual work by 5+ hours per day and optimized resource usage by over 50%.

pt.title: Automação de Operações Jurídicas
pt.description: Motor de sincronização entre MyCase e Monday.com para escritório nos EUA. Redução de 5+ horas manuais por dia e otimização de recursos acima de 50%.

en.title: NestJS Microservices Architecture
en.description: Backend architecture demonstrating microservices using NestJS, NATS, SQL databases, and Docker.

pt.description: Arquitetura backend demonstrando microsserviços com NestJS, NATS, bancos SQL e Docker.
